response.original_title: TCB - The Toni Cade Bambara School of Organizing
response.overview: TCB â€“ The Toni Cade Bambara School of Organizing is a biography of the influential writer Toni Cade Bambara, whose literary works and film collaborations were a catalyzing force in 20th century cultural and political movements. The documentary is made up of stories shared by friends and colleagues including Toni Morrison, Nikky Finney and Haile Gerima.
response.title: TCB - The Toni Cade Bambara School of Organizing
